channel.title: Open Source on S.M. Oliva
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on S.M. Oliva

item.title: Using Desktop Linux in 2021
item.description: A few days ago, I purchased an iPad. This is my first Apple device in awhile, so I decided to check and see if my Apple ID still worked. It did, albeit after going through the process of resetting my long-forgotten password. To my slight surprise, this was the first time I’d used my Apple ID since 2012. That was the year I moved away from OS X to Linux as my everyday operating system.
